entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending early this afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
